definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
lit. stale grain, overcooked sesame (idiom); fig. the same boring old gossip
pinyin: chen2 gu3 zi5 lan4 zhi1 ma5

definition: to let go of the big prize while grabbing at trifles (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 le5 zhi1 ma5 diu1 le5 xi1 gua1

sentences.english: These sesame sweets came from a sweet shop in Beijing earlier this week.
sentences.chinese: 這幾塊芝麻糖是這周前兩天在北京一家糖果鋪買的。

sentences.english: Pinyin is like a kind of 'Open sesame,' opening up the doors," he says.
sentences.chinese: 拼音就像“芝麻開門”，爲人們敞開了大門”他說。

sentences.english: Put sesame paste in a bowl, mix 2tbsp cool boiled water to mix well.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻醬放在碗裏，加涼開水50克調勻。

sentences.english: Parma ham, fresh mozzarella, arugula salad filling with tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 巴馬火腿，馬蘇裏拉，芝麻草和番茄醬。

sentences.english: The cast of the 40th season of "Sesame Street.
sentences.chinese: 《芝麻街》第40季的全體演職人員合影。

sentences.english: The black sesame market is taken by the comparatively safe Myanmar sesame.
sentences.chinese: 黑芝麻市場被相對安全的緬甸芝麻所佔領。

sentences.english: The black sesame market is taken by the comparatively safe Myanmar sesame.
sentences.chinese: 黑芝麻市場被相對安全的緬甸芝麻所佔領。

sentences.english: All Japanese pork chop specialist will have you ground your own sesame to make the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 所有日色豬扒店都會要你自己磨芝麻做醬料。

sentences.english: Crashing sesame market is taken by African sesame, which has price advantage.
sentences.chinese: 榨油芝麻被非洲的具有價格優勢的芝麻佔領。

sentences.english: Crashing sesame market is taken by African sesame, which has price advantage.
sentences.chinese: 榨油芝麻被非洲的具有價格優勢的芝麻佔領。

sentences.english: There's really no point in arguing about pinpoints.
sentences.chinese: 爲芝麻綠豆般的小事爭論實在毫無意義。

sentences.english: Pour honey and strew white sesame.
sentences.chinese: 淋上蜂蜜，撒上白芝麻即可。

sentences.english: Roll rice into circular shape, press to make patties, sprinkle sesame on top.
sentences.chinese: 將飯搓成球狀，壓扁成米餅狀，在上面灑上芝麻。

sentences.english: Small tan sesame seed-sized lice are seen scattered amongst the hairs of the head.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻大小黝黑小蝨在頭髮中散佈。

sentences.english: The weather conditions was conducive to the sesame seeds growth, the sesame grew well in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 天氣條件有利於芝麻生長髮育，農田芝麻長勢喜人。
